title: Privacy Policy | Ozum'le Legal Information
description: At Ozum'le, we value your privacy. Review our privacy policy detailing how your personal information is collected, used, and protected.
keywords: Privacy policy, personal data protection, data security, user privacy, e-commerce privacy policy, customer data protection, Ozumle privacy

parts.title: Privacy Policy
content: At Ozum'le, protecting the privacy of our users and processing their personal data securely is of utmost importance to us.
This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website and contact us through our corporate WhatsApp line.

parts.title: Information Collected
content: We do not collect personal information directly through our website.
However, if our users contact us through our corporate WhatsApp line, we may collect the following personal data:
list: Other information shared via WhatsApp (text messages, images, documents, etc.)

parts.title: Purposes of Using Personal Data
content: We use the personal data collected through our corporate WhatsApp line for the following purposes:
list: Responding to user requests and questions
Providing our services and increasing user satisfaction

parts.title: Security of Personal Data
content: Personal data obtained through our corporate WhatsApp line is securely protected and accessible only by our authorised employees.
Thanks to WhatsApp's end-to-end encryption technology, your messages cannot be viewed by third parties.

parts.title: Sharing of Personal Data
content: We share your personal data obtained via WhatsApp with third parties only in the following cases:

parts.title: User Rights
content: As users, you have the following rights:
list: Requesting access to your personal data
Requesting correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Requesting deletion of your personal data (except for legal obligations)
Restricting the processing of your data

parts.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
content: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time due to changes in laws and our services.
You can see the last update date of the policy on this page.

parts.title: Contact Information
content: If you have questions or requests about our privacy policy, please contact us:
list: Address: Mimar Sinan Mahallesi Uskudar Caddesi No: 1 YEDPA Ticaret Merkezi F/48 Atasehir / Istanbul

parts.title: Conclusion
content: With this privacy policy, we transparently present to you how your personal data is processed and protected.
By using our website and corporate WhatsApp line, you are deemed to have accepted this policy.
